22-0489.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Thursday, February 17, 2022.A motion was made by Vice Chair Austin, seconded by Member Richardson, to approve recommendation. 22-0490.summary: Recommendation to receive and file legislative update reports from the City’s State delegation offices.Senator Steven Bradford spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.Assemblymember Mike Gipson spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Austin and Assemblymember Mike Gipson.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.Assemblymember Mike Gipson spoke.Jacob O'Donnell spoke.Zach Keller spoke.A motion was made by Member Richardson, seconded by Chair Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Uranga, Austin and Richardson3.
